text:
Hinana wants a set filled with lots of balloons and...
oh, she also wants to wear new cute costumes!

Maybe try flying in the air~ or having something
with fire! Fireworks would be nice too!

Maybe not~?
Then how about candy raining down from the ceiling!

Oh, that's dangerous...!
It might hit the audience...!

Oh~
Koito-chan, you always say no to everything~!

W-Well...! Besides...
Hinana's ideas are what Hinana wants to do...

It's not really for the fans,
right...?
We should do something more for the fans...

Hinana takes photos like this
and uploads them to Twesta~

Singing, dancing, and seeing
Hinana having fun and being happy...

If everyone becomes happy seeing that,
then isn't that good enough?

So, what about you, Koito-chan~?
What do you want to do?
